attributes.action: Petition to have Wheatsheaf Avenue, Newark, Notts made into a "Traffic Calmed Area"
attributes.additional_details: people speeding and excessive accelerating on the same stretch of road. I think something needs to be done to control the speed of the traffic and it is residential area with a lot of young children living in the area. This petition is for wheatsheaf avenue, newark, notts to be changed to a traffic calmed area, which could lead to some speed bumps put in place.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
